submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumDifference(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ans = abs(k - nums[0])
        current = set([nums[0]])
        for i in range(1, len(nums)):
            n = nums[i]
            new_current = set([n])
            ans = min(ans, abs(k-n))
            for x in current:
                x1 = x&n
                ans = min(ans, abs(k-x1))
                new_current.add(x1)
            # print(new_current)
            current = new_current
        return ans
